title: Preferences: Family Game Night
question_text: Itâ€™s family game night in Cocoa Beach. Residents settle in to play their favorite game and eat their favorite snack. A random sample of $115\text{ families}$ were asked their preferred game and snack, and the results are presented in the two-way table below. Pizza Rolls Chips and Dip Cookies Yahtzee 10 3 12 Trivial Pursuit 8 14 7 Monopoly 14 17 7 Wii Bowling 12 7 4 What are the game preferences in order, from most popular to least popular?

choices.text: Yahtzee, Trivial Pursuit, Monopoly, Wii Bowling.
Wii Bowling, Monopoly, Trivial Pursuit, Yahtzee.
Monopoly, Trivial Pursuit, Yahtzee, Wii Bowling.
Wii Bowling, Yahtzee, Trivial Pursuit, Monopoly.
Trivial Pursuit, Monopoly, Wii Bowling, Yahtzee.
